title: Orcbow
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For the removed concept of "orcish equipment", see [racial equipment](/Racial_equipment "Racial equipment").*

| Name                                           | Orcbow                                             |
| :--------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons") |
| [Damage](/Weapon_damage "Weapon damage")       | 11                                                 |
| Accuracy                                       | -3                                                 |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 15                                                 |
| [Min delay](/Minimum_delay "Minimum delay")    | 7 at 16 skill                                      |
| [Hands](/Handedness "Handedness")              | 2H                                                 |
| Size                                           | Large                                              |
| Ranged?                                        | Yes                                                |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A recurved bow, crudely crafted from troll-bone and warg hair. The cave orcs' use of archery, so unlike their surface-dwelling cousins, shows the influence of their elvish allies. |

> This weapon falls into the '[Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")' category. It is a two-handed weapon.

**Orcbows** are an upgrade over [shortbows](/Shortbow "Shortbow"), with more damage, but less accuracy and a higher [base delay](/Attack_delay "Attack delay"). They can often be found on [orc warriors](/Orc_warrior "Orc warrior"), as well as [centaurs](/Centaur_\(monster\) "Centaur (monster)") and [centaur warriors](/Centaur_warrior "Centaur warrior").

|              | Image                                                         |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Mundane**  | [![Orcbow1.png](/images/9/92/Orcbow1.png)](/File:Orcbow1.png) |
| **Magical**  | [![Orcbow2.png](/images/0/08/Orcbow2.png)](/File:Orcbow2.png) |
| **Artifact** | [![Orcbow3.png](/images/3/35/Orcbow3.png)](/File:Orcbow3.png) |

## History

- Orcbows were introduced in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31").

| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") | [Club](/Club "Club") • [Demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") • [Dire flail](/Dire_flail "Dire flail") • [Eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") • [Flail](/Flail "Flail") • [Giant club](/Giant_club "Giant club") • [Giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") • [Great mace](/Great_mace "Great mace") • [Mace](/Mace "Mace") ([Hammer](/Hammer "Hammer")) • [Morningstar](/Morningstar "Morningstar") • [Sacred scourge](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge") • [Whip](/Whip "Whip") |
| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon](/Hand_cannon "Hand cannon") • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow]() • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

html:
Orcbow

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For the removed concept of "orcish equipment", see racial equipment.

Name Orcbow
Skill Ranged Weapons
Damage 11
Accuracy -3
Base delay (%) 15
Min delay 7 at 16 skill
Hands 2H
Size Large
Ranged? Yes
A recurved bow, crudely crafted from troll-bone and warg hair. The cave orcs' use of archery, so unlike their surface-dwelling cousins, shows the influence of their elvish allies.
This weapon falls into the 'Ranged Weapons' category. It is a two-handed weapon.

Orcbows are an upgrade over shortbows, with more damage, but less accuracy and a higher base delay. They can often be found on orc warriors, as well as centaurs and centaur warriors.

Image
Mundane
Magical
Artifact

History

  • Orcbows were introduced in 0.31.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net
